mapper.insert: insert into edu_course ( id, teacher_id, subject_id, subject_parent_id, title, price, lesson_num, cover, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) values ( #{id}, #{teacherId}, #{subjectId}, #{subjectParentId}, #{title}, #{price}, #{lessonNum}, #{cover}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified} )
mapper.select: select title, description, teacher_id, subject_id, subject_parent_id, price, cover, lesson_num from edu_course c,edu_course_description d where c.id = d.id and c.id = #{courseId}

select ec.id as id, ec.title as title, ec.cover as cover, ec.lesson_num as lessonNum, ec.price as price, ecd.description as description, es1.title as subjectLevelOne, es2.title as subjectLevelTwo, et.name as teacherName from edu_course ec left join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id left join edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_id = es1.id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_parent_id = es2.id left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id where ec.id = #{courseId}
mapper.update: update edu_course set status = 'Normal' where id = #{courseId}
